member.summary: Allows identification of a process which is to be visualised to the user.

member.summary: Constructs the object. It is assumed that user interaction is not allowed until the task is completed.

member.summary: Constructs the object. It is assumed that user interaction is not allowed until the task is completed.
member.param: A user friendly description of the process.

member.name: M:Mulholland.WinForms.VisualizableProcess.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs the object. It is assumed that user interaction is not allowed until the task is completed.
member.param: Set to true if the arrow hourglass cursor is to be displayed, allowing the user to continue interacting during the duration of a process.

member.name: M:Mulholland.WinForms.VisualizableProcess.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs the object
member.param: A user friendly description of the process.
Set to true if the arrow hourglass cursor is to be displayed, allowing the user to continue interacting during the duration of a process.

member.summary: Gets or sets the description associated with the process.

member.summary: Gets whether user interaction is allowed, determining whether an arrow and hourglass is displayed instead of an hourglass.
